traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl)

traits.label: type
traits.name: :type
traits.desc: 1) Define the button native type attribute (submit, reset, button) or 2) render component with <a> tag so you can access events even if disable or 3) Use 'href' prop and specify 'type' as a media tag

traits.label: to
traits.name: :to
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: replace
traits.name: :replace
traits.desc: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used

traits.label: href
traits.name: :href
traits.desc: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to' and 'replace' props

traits.label: target
traits.name: :target
traits.desc: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only with 'to' or 'href' props

traits.label: label
traits.name: :label
traits.desc: The text that will be shown on the button

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: icon-right
traits.name: :icon-right
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: outline
traits.name: :outline
traits.desc: Use 'outline' design

traits.label: flat
traits.name: :flat
traits.desc: Use 'flat' design

traits.label: unelevated
traits.name: :unelevated
traits.desc: Remove shadow

traits.label: rounded
traits.name: :rounded
traits.desc: Applies a more prominent border-radius for a squared shape button

traits.label: push
traits.name: :push
traits.desc: Use 'push' design

traits.label: square
traits.name: :square
traits.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

traits.label: glossy
traits.name: :glossy
traits.desc: Applies a glossy effect

traits.label: fab
traits.name: :fab
traits.desc: Makes button size and shape to fit a Floating Action Button

traits.label: fab-mini
traits.name: :fab-mini
traits.desc: Makes button size and shape to fit a small Floating Action Button

traits.label: padding
traits.name: :padding
traits.desc: Apply custom padding (vertical [horizontal]); Size in CSS units, including unit name or standard size name (none|xs|sm|md|lg|xl); Also removes the min width and height when set

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: text-color
traits.name: :text-color
traits.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: no-caps
traits.name: :no-caps
traits.desc: Avoid turning label text into caps (which happens by default)

traits.label: no-wrap
traits.name: :no-wrap
traits.desc: Avoid label text wrapping

traits.label: dense
traits.name: :dense
traits.desc: Dense mode; occupies less space

traits.label: ripple
traits.name: :ripple
traits.desc: Configure material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object)
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }

traits.label: tabindex
traits.name: :tabindex
traits.desc: Tabindex HTML attribute value

traits.label: align
traits.name: :align
traits.desc: Label or content alignment

traits.label: stack
traits.name: :stack
traits.desc: Stack icon and label vertically instead of on same line (like it is by default)

traits.label: stretch
traits.name: :stretch
traits.desc: When used on flexbox parent, button will stretch to parent's height

traits.label: loading
traits.name: :loading
traits.desc: Put button into loading state (displays a QSpinner -- can be overridden by using a 'loading' slot)

traits.label: disable
traits.name: :disable
traits.desc: Put component in disabled mode

traits.label: round
traits.name: :round
traits.desc: Makes a circle shaped button

traits.label: percentage
traits.name: :percentage
traits.desc: Percentage (0.0 < x < 100.0); To be used along 'loading' prop; Display a progress bar on the background

traits.label: dark-percentage
traits.name: :dark-percentage
traits.desc: Progress bar on the background should have dark color; To be used along with 'percentage' and 'loading' props
